DOC.criteria: 1 . BMI 18,525 kg/m2 2 . Fasting plasma glucose less 6.1 mmol/l 3 . Normal 2hour oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) 1 . Any chronic disease medication could affect glucose metabolism 2 . History anorexia nervosa bulimia 3 . Smoking tobacco , take snuff , use narcotic 4 . Abusive use alcohol 5 . Any condition opinion investigator could create hazard subject safety , endanger study procedure interfere interpretation study result
